result.ponchtml: téim ċuig ceolċoirm nó ċuig seisiún ceoil de ġnáṫI usually go to a concert or a music session.

result.eng: How do you go to work?
result.ga: cén chaoi a dtéann tú go dtí an obair
result.orig: cén chaoi a dtéann tú go dtí an obair
result.html: cén chaoi a dtéann tú go dtí an obairHow do you go to work?
result.ponchtml: cén ċaoi a dtéann tú go dtí an obairHow do you go to work?

result.eng: I go to work on my bike.
result.ga: téim go dtí an obair ar mo rothar
result.orig: téim go dtí an obair ar mo rothar
result.html: téim go dtí an obair ar mo rotharI go to work on my bike.
result.ponchtml: téim go dtí an obair ar mo roṫarI go to work on my bike.

result.eng: I go to work by bus.
result.ga: téim go dtí an obair ar an mbus
result.orig: téim go dtí an obair ar an mbus
result.html: téim go dtí an obair ar an mbusI go to work by bus.
result.ponchtml: téim go dtí an obair ar an mbusI go to work by bus.

result.eng: I go to work by train.
result.ga: téim go dtí an obair ar an traein
result.orig: téim go dtí an obair ar an traein
result.html: téim go dtí an obair ar an traeinI go to work by train.
result.ponchtml: téim go dtí an obair ar an traeinI go to work by train.

result.eng: Do you go out sometimes?
result.ga: an dtéann tú amach uaireanta
result.orig: an dtéann tú amach uaireanta
result.html: an dtéann tú amach uaireantaDo you go out sometimes?
result.ponchtml: an dtéann tú amaċ uaireantaDo you go out sometimes?

result.eng: She wasn't a woman who'd go back on her word [who wouldn't do what she'd said she'd do].
result.ga: níor bhean í a chuaigh siar ar a focal
result.orig: níor bhean í a chuaigh siar ar a focal
result.html: níor bhean í a chuaigh siar ar a focalShe wasn't a woman who'd go back on her word [who wouldn't do what she'd said she'd do].
result.ponchtml: níor ḃean í a ċuaiġ siar ar a focalShe wasn't a woman who'd go back on her word [who wouldn't do what she'd said she'd do].

result.eng: She was not allowed to go out from the house on her own.
result.ga: ní raibh cead aici dul amach as an teach ina haonar
result.orig: ní raibh cead aici dul amach as an teach ina haonar
result.html: ní raibh cead aici dul amach as an teach ina haonarShe was not allowed to go out from the house on her own.
result.ponchtml: ní raiḃ cead aici dul amaċ as an teaċ ina haonarShe was not allowed to go out from the house on her own.

result.eng: An airplane couldn't go all the way through the building, could it?
result.ga: ní fhéadfadh eitleán dul an bealach ar fad tríd an bhfoirgneamh an bhféadfadh
result.orig: ní fhéadfadh eitleán dul an bealach ar fad tríd an bhfoirgneamh an bhféadfadh
result.html: ní fhéadfadh eitleán dul an bealach ar fad tríd an bhfoirgneamh an bhféadfadhAn airplane couldn't go all the way through the building, could it?
result.ponchtml: ní ḟéadfaḋ eitleán dul an bealaċ ar fad tríd an ḃfoirgneaṁ an ḃféadfaḋAn airplane couldn't go all the way through the building, could it?

result.eng: The Trade Centre's south tower let go [ie. started collapsing].
result.ga: thug túr theas an lárionad trádála uaidh
result.orig: thug túr theas an lárionad trádála uaidh
result.html: thug túr theas an lárionad trádála uaidhThe Trade Centre's south tower let go [ie. started collapsing].
result.ponchtml: ṫug túr ṫeas an lárionad trádála uaiḋThe Trade Centre's south tower let go [ie. started collapsing].

result.eng: He was undecided whether he should take the prisoner with him or let him go.
result.ga: bhí sé eadar dhá chómhairle cé acu a bhéarfadh sé leis an príosúnach nó a ligfeadh sé a cheann leis
result.orig: bhí sé eadar dhá chómhairle cé acu a bhéarfadh sé leis an príosúnach nó a ligfeadh sé a cheann leis
result.html: bhí sé eadar dhá chómhairle cé acu a bhéarfadh sé leis an príosúnach nó a ligfeadh sé a cheann leisHe was undecided whether he should take the prisoner with him or let him go.
result.ponchtml: ḃí sé eadar ḋá ċóṁairle cé acu a ḃéarfaḋ sé leis an príosúnaċ nó a ligfeaḋ sé a ċeann leisHe was undecided whether he should take the prisoner with him or let him go.

result.eng: He would have to go to sleep on an empty stomach.
result.ga: b'éigean dó luí ar phutóga folmha go maidin
result.orig: b'éigean dó luí ar phutóga folmha go maidin
result.html: b'éigean dó luí ar phutóga folmha go maidinHe would have to go to sleep on an empty stomach.
